commit message: Moved functionality from ArticleActivity into ArticleFragment

- Added preference to enable tablet layout, early beta for now
- Added layouts for bigger screens which are not yet modified appropriately

- Removed unused vacuum-code and strings
- Tried to move DB-Open-Checks near the actual DB-access to make hopefully reduce the amount of 'Cursor already closed' exceptions

- Reduced minVersion update time
- Stopped TopExceptionHandler from generating error reports for SecurityException: 'No permission to modify given thread'
Modified layouts. Display Categories, Feeds and Headlines and when clicking a headline we switch to headlines left and articles right side. Going back should then display cats/feeds/heads again.
Properly hide ActionBar when switching articles
Disabled tablet-preference since I cannot test the layout until I got a tablet, the emulator is plain unusable for me.
